meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kris Dages Brianne Archer Scott Lord Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7118.

td.p: Kris Dages, a software engineer from Austin, Texas
Brianne Archer, an environmental engineer from Bellflower, California
Scott Lord, a construction attorney from Santa Monica, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $55,401)

tr.td: DIET FADS
TRAVELIN' AROUND THE COUNTRY
WHAT'S THAT WEBSITE?
OXFORD DICTIONARIES WORD OF THE YEAR
YOUR OLD RECORDS
THERE'S SOMETHING IN THE AIR

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Eating this citrus fruit at every meal has been a diet fad since the 1930s; a halved one epitomizes diet food')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Eating this citrus fruit at every meal has been a diet fad since the 1930s; a halved one epitomizes diet food

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
